mapper.insert:
insert into alarm(sender, senderNickname, senderImg, receiver, feedno, commentno, pickno, date, type, readcheck) values (#{sender},#{senderNickname},#{senderImg},#{receiver},#{feedno},#{commentno}, #{pickno}, #{date} ,#{type}, 0)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update alarm set readcheck = 1 where receiver = #{receiver};
mapper.delete: delete from alarm where receiver = #{receiver} and date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and readcheck = 1
